p: Zapata [ 11], reported that the LS_EO extracted by HD contained 16 compounds with safrole (82.4%) and limonene (7.76%) being the highest [ 11]. The CA_EO analysis CG-MS contained 6 compounds where 1-terpinen-4-ol (28.19%) and β-terpineno (23.08%) constituted the majority. The LS_EO contained 12 compounds where safrol (31.43%) and (1 S)-α-pineno (27.91%) constituted the majority [ 9].
